duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage inbound leads and inquiries on CRM systems such as Salesforce and HubSpot.
Demonstrate and promote educational VR products through virtual demos and email correspondence.
Collaborate with AI agents to generate leads and automate interactions, maintaining a human touch.
Achieve and exceed sales targets, build and maintain customer relationships, and understand competitive landscape.
Attend industry-related events and internal sales meetings, and create quotes and opportunities in CRM systems.
Work with Marketing Team on content and campaigns to drive business growth.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree preferred but not required.
